headlines.description: Chelsea were embarrassed 4-0 at Bournemouth in Premier League action on Wednesday.

video.headline: King extends Bournemouth's lead vs. Chelsea

tracking.trackingName: King extends Bournemouth's lead vs. Chelsea

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Southampton and Crystal Palace were left hovering above the Premier League's relegation zone after they fought out a 1-1 draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton hold Palace in dour bottom-half tussle

headlines.description: Liverpool capitalised on Manchester City's defeat earlier this week, but not in the way they would have wanted as they drew 1-1 with Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool extend lead with Leicester draw

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur forwards Son Heung-min and Fernando Llorente scored late goals to secure a barely deserved 2-1 win over Watford.

video.headline: Tottenham 2-1 Watford: Llorente secures dramatic win

headlines.shortLinkText: Son, Llorente strike late as Spurs beat Watford
